graph_title: Manufacturing employment as a proportion of total employment
indicator_name: Manufacturing employment as a proportion of total employment
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Manufacturing employment as a proportion of total employment
methodology_global: The indicator is represented by the share of manufacturing employment in total employment. Computation Method: Total employment in manufacturing activities/Total employment in all economic activities * 100
SDG_GOAL: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
SDG_TARGET: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries
SDG_INDICATOR: Manufacturing employment as a proportion of total employment
